instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: how to measure if CPU voltage going below threshold
threads.message: does anyone know a way to measure a MacBooks CPU core voltage to see if the reason for crashing is going below the minimum? It's a 2014 15 inch MacBook Pro, in that range where this is a known issue as far as I know. The difficulty I'm having is reproducing the crash so it's hard to say if the fix that I have in place, the no crash app from real Mac mods, is effective or it's just coincidence
